To install and start Ganache, you can follow these steps:

1. Download the installation package from https://truffleframework.com/ganache/
2. Install the package and open the program.
3. Upon opening, you will see an interface where you can view accounts, blocks, transactions, and logs.
4. Click on "Settings" to configure parameters such as IP, port (set to 8545), number of accounts, gas limit, and click "restart" for the settings to take effect.
5. Ganache will now be running a private Ethereum network on your local machine, bound to port 8545.
